name: 陳怡倩
objective: 本課程藉由不同情境之英語錄影帶, 以及專題的語彙題目來提供一個英語談話的情境使學生能學習合宜的詞句。小組討論、角色演練、口頭報告皆為主要教學技巧，俾能增強學生之聽說能力。
schedule:
Week 1 Course Introduction
Week 2 Personal Qualities
Week 3 Relationships
Week 4 Double Tenth Day (No Class)
Week 5 School & Education I
Week 6 School & Education II
Week 7 Places I
Week 8 Places II
Week 9 Mid-term
Week 10 Entertainment I
Week 11 Entertainment II
Week 12 Dreams
Week 13 Communication Technologies I
Week 14 Communication Technologies II
Week 15 Etiquette I
Week 16 Etiquette II
Week 17 TBA
Week 18 Final
scorePolicy: In-class activities (30%); Weekly mini presentations (15%); Dialogue journal (15%); Mid-term oral exam (20%); Final oral exam (20%)
